channel.title: Can u post me sum tuts
channel.description:
i need a tut on how to make the foloing: I need to spawn monsters ive got my places redy : i need some shop tuts plz : I need a tut on how to change item stats : I need a tut on npc spawns aswell and wt to make them say : and finaly i need tuts on how to raise max lvls and combat
all these will be apriciated and u can come and see my server if u wnna have a laugh
you could post here or join my hamachi and talk me through it on there
ham:my test scape pass:123

item.title: Can u post me sum tuts
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

changing max level

search for

 for public int getXPForLevel(int level) {

You should see something like

[code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     if (lvl >= level) {
        return output;
     }
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  }
  return 0;

}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp) {
        return lvl;
     }
  }
  return 135;

}[/code]

Step 1: Change all of that to

[code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     if (lvl >= level) {
        return output;
     }
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  }
  return 0;

}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= [MAX STAT ERE]; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp) {
        return lvl;
     }
  }
  return [MAX STAT ERE];

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Can u post me sum tuts
